dict.acceptation: 依靠的；依赖的；取决于…的；有瘾的；
受抚养人；受赡养者；依赖他人者；扈从，侍从；

sent.orig: ObjectiveTo investigate the therapeutic mechanism of three-step sequential method(TSSM)on patients with corticosteroid-dependent asthma(SDA).
sent.trans: 目的揭示三步序贯法治疗激素依赖型哮喘(steroid-dependent asthma,SDA)的疗效机制。

sent.orig: Diversity and evenness were apparently positive dependent, but diversity and simplicity were negative dependent.
sent.trans: 多样度与均度呈显著的正相关，与单纯度呈显著的负相关。

sent.orig: You must attend with any dependents such as your wife, dependent children or dependent adults.
sent.trans: 您必须出席与所有受抚养者例如您的妻子、依赖孩子或者依赖成人。

sent.orig: STUDENT is not dependent on us are dependent on the student.
sent.trans: 从各种角度来看，学生是一个学校最重要的人。

sent.orig: Some general properties of time-dependent invariants in general time-dependent quantum systems are established. 4.
sent.trans: 研究了一般含时量子体系中的含时不变量的普遍性质。
